body_html:
I installed from sources using the guide on tensorflow page. More specifically, after configuring tensorflow, I executed the following:

bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package 
bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
cd /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
pip install /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-1.2.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl

I also attach the results of aforementioned command:

(tensorflow) gpu@gpuserver:/tmp/tensorflow_pkg$ python
Python 3.6.1 |Continuum Analytics, Inc.| (default, May 11 2017, 13:09:58) 
[GCC 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-1)] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow
>>> tensorflow
<module 'tensorflow' from '/home/gpu/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/__init__.py'>
>>> quit()
(tensorflow) gpu@gpuserver:/tmp/tensorflow_pkg$ ls /home/gpu/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow
contrib  examples  __init__.py  python       tools
core     include   __pycache__  tensorboard

body:
I installed from sources using the guide on tensorflow page. More specifically, after configuring tensorflow, I executed the following:

```
bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package 
bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
cd /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
pip install /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-1.2.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
```
I also attach the results of aforementioned command:
```
(tensorflow) gpu@gpuserver:/tmp/tensorflow_pkg$ python
Python 3.6.1 |Continuum Analytics, Inc.| (default, May 11 2017, 13:09:58) 
[GCC 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-1)] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow
>>> tensorflow
<module 'tensorflow' from '/home/gpu/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/__init__.py'>
>>> quit()
(tensorflow) gpu@gpuserver:/tmp/tensorflow_pkg$ ls /home/gpu/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow
contrib  examples  __init__.py  python       tools
core     include   __pycache__  tensorboard
```
